aboutMeSection.title: About me
aboutMeSection.subtitle: Get to know me
aboutMeSection.text: I'm a frontend developer passionate about crafting accessible and pixel-perfect interfaces that combine thoughtful design with reliable development. My passion lies in creating web applications that are not only visually appealing but also optimized for maximum performance and usability. I constantly explore new technologies and methodologies in the frontend development world, with a particular interest in React and Vue ecosystems. My goal is to create intuitive interfaces that make technology more accessible to users. I believe in the importance of clean code, component-based approach, and continuous improvement. Each project for me is an opportunity to create something useful and learn something new. In my free time, I focus on self-education, learning English, and exploring new trends in web development, because technology never stands still, and I strive to evolve with it.

mindenitUi.title: Mindenit UI
mindenitUi.description: A custom UI components library based on Radix Vue, designed to streamline consistent UI patterns across Mindenit team projects. Features extensive documentation and example usage.

nureScheduleVue.title: Nure Schedule (Vue)
nureScheduleVue.description: A rebuilt scheduling tool for NURE University, transitioned from React to Vue to improve page load speed and UI responsiveness, serving over 2,000 students.

movieSearch.title: Movie Search
movieSearch.description: A search engine for movie and TV series information, providing users with detailed data on popular films and shows, based on free API. The project was created in 2022 but uploaded on a new github profile in 2023.

codeEditor.title: Code Editor
codeEditor.description: A simple code editor with syntax highlighting and an interactive UI, enhancing usability and accessibility for beginner developers. The project was created in 2022 but uploaded on a new github profile in 2023.

mindenit.title: Frontend Developer
mindenit.description: Successfully rebuilt and maintained three major web applications serving over 1,000 monthly active users. Achieved a 70% performance improvement by transitioning from React to Vue.js, implementing advanced optimization techniques and modern frontend practices. Led the development of a custom UI library to ensure consistency across projects.

nure.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering
nure.description: Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Engineering, focusing on computer systems design, diagnostics, programming, and Internet services. The program covers a wide range of technologies including system administration, network development, and cloud computing.

itstep.title: Software Development Course
itstep.description: Completed a comprehensive 3-year program covering various aspects of software development including system programming, web development, and design. Successfully graduated with practical experience in multiple programming languages and development approaches.
